text: Erechthias macrozyga is a species of moth in the family Tineidae. It was described by Edward Meyrick in 1916. This species is endemic to New Zealand. The holotype specimen of this species was collected at Tisbury, Invercargill by Alfred Philpott. ==References== ==External links== *Image of type specimen of Erechthias macrozyga Category:Moths described in 1916 Category:Erechthiinae Category:Moths of New Zealand Category:Endemic fauna of New Zealand Category:Taxa named by Edward Meyrick
title: Erechthias macrozyga
